metadata.name: No Auto-Cutscenes
metadata.description:
[h1]WARNING! Do not use this mod if you are trying to get your Mega Satan or Beast unlocks! The unlocks/achievements/completion marks are tied to the cutscenes.[/h1]
This mod was inspired by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2667845009]NO Mega Satan auto cutscene[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=938928749]AlwaysVoid[/url]. It can block the cutscenes from automatically playing after Mega Satan and The Beast.
[list] [*]Mega Satan [list] [*]A chest will spawn in the boss room [*]Optionally, a fool card will spawn [*]Optionally, a void portal will also spawn [/list] [*]The Beast [list] [*]You'll be taken back to the living room where you fought Dogma [*]A chest will spawn [*]Optionally, a void portal will also spawn [/list] [/list]
For challenges, trophies will spawn instead of chests.
Mod Config Menu can be used to: [list] [*]block the cutscenes after Mega Satan and/or The Beast [*]change the void portal spawning probability [*]spawn 0 - The Fool after Mega Satan (lets you teleport back to the main map) [*]apply your settings to challenges or not [/list]
Note: Even if you choose to allow the Mega Satan cutscene, the game may still decide to spawn a chest and void portal instead.
Note: Walking into the chest after The Beast will end the game, but it won't increment your win streak. You'll need to go fight Delirium if you want a +1.
